title: WHY IS MUNDO SUPPORT A THING?!
body:
Because Mundo goes where he pleases.

I apologize for nothing. Even reposts.

ESPECIALLY reposts.

replies.body: I understand that you want to play Mundo support, however your teammates do not want you to play Mundo support.
But, but, but, Death is the best CC
Its only best on the enemy bot lane not yours.

If people go all ADCs and assassins, they will deal with whatever support they get.

That aside, Mundo's healing rate makes him a great shock trooper, tank supports get access to a lot of healing rate items, and he can endlessly poke the enemy and as long as he hits is guaranteed to deal a set amount of damage.
Honestly mundo support an't that bad. Come back with shaco support or mf and I'll qq.

I am loving that this is becoming it's own new meme

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Mundo support?  MUNDO SUPPORT!?  MUNDO IS ADC!!!!!
